column5: Needed to get a bunch of stuff so I set up a meet in Acton at Steve's shop, picked up a bunch of spinnerbaits, a few spoons & 3 Musky Spinners for future use, great to visit for an hour or 2 and ask for a couple different colour & blade designs if possible. Liked the Orange/White combo.Thanx & Tight Lines Richard (SBK)  http://south-bruce-guide-service.blogspot.ca/2016/08/august-10-i-made-trip-to-blackflylures.html
